generated_doNotEdit.title: Water Appearance
generated_doNotEdit.description: Set the water surface color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default water surface color behavior.

fields.title: surface_color
fields.description: RGB color of the water surface

fields.title: surface_opacity
fields.description: Opacity of the water surface (must be between 0 for invisible and 1 for opaque, inclusive)
